mapper.sql: ID, OddsID, upOdds, Goal, downOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly
mapper.select: select l.oddsid,d.* from letgoalhalf l LEFT JOIN letgoalhalfdetail d on l.OddsID = d.OddsID where l.ScheduleID = #{mid} and l.CompanyID = #{cpy} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into letgoalhalfdetail (ID, OddsID, upOdds, Goal, downOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into letgoalhalfdetail
ID,
OddsID,
upOdds,
Goal,
downOdds,
ModifyTime,
isEarly,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update letgoalhalfdetail
OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
upOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
downOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update letgoalhalfdetail set OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, downOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
